q1: What do the status code categories mean?
a1: 1xx: informational, 2xx: success, 3xx: redirection, 4xx: client error, 5xx: server error.
q2: What is the most common error code?
a2: 404 Not Found is the most well-known. 500 Internal Server Error is the most common server-side error.
a3: 418 I am a Teapot is an April Fools joke from RFC 2324. It is defined but not expected to be used by actual servers.
